title: LeBron James. Giannis Antetokounmpo, Lions, and Baker Mayfield
itunes:title: LeBron James. Giannis Antetokounmpo, Lions, and Baker Mayfield
description:
Colin discusses LeBron James showing how great he still is last night against the Pelicans, why it's important for the Bucks to win this season if they want to keep Giannis Antetokounmpo, why the Lions need to move on and draft Tua Tagovailoa, and why Colin believes Baker Mayfield still isn't taking his job seriously. Guests include Chris Haynes, Daniel Jeremiah, Marcel Reece, and John Middlekauff.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
